casebody.data:
W. A. CROSS v. G. H. TUCKER and RUBY TUCKER, his wife, and PEARL E. OGLE SANTEE, formerly PEARLE E. OGLE and C. T. SANTEE, her husband, and HAZEL TYNER MAIN and FRANCIS E. MAIN, her husband. 28 So. (2nd) 541

June Term, 1946

December 13, 1946 Special Division B Rehearing Denied June 11, 1947

Affirmed.
